metadata.title: CVE-2019-20922 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Handlebars before 4.4.5 allows Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS)because of eager matching. The parser may be forced into an endless loopwhile processing crafted templates. This may allow attackers to exhaustsystem resources.

criterions.comment: node-handlebars package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
